definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Our days should be as carefully tended.
sentences.chinese: 我们的日子也应如此须得到细心照应。

sentences.english: Pack the clothes carefully so that you don't crease them.
sentences.chinese: 把衣服细心装好，免得弄皱了。

sentences.english: The meticulous man frequently spends too abundance time on a task.
sentences.chinese: 过分细心的人，对一件事花费太多时间。

sentences.english: She takes good care of her children and keeps them all at school.
sentences.chinese: 她细心地照顾孩子并使他们都上学读书。

sentences.english: For the future, try to be more careful.
Before I came downstairs I had prepared myself very carefully for what I must say.
sentences.chinese: 在我下楼前，我就细心准备好我必须说什么。

sentences.english: Mary is the most careful student in our class.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽是我们班最细心的学生。

sentences.english: He tends the flower beds and evergreens that he has planted in the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 他总是细心呵护着种植在车道边的花圃和常青树。

sentences.english: And puts it in his private starbucks thermo mug everyday.
sentences.chinese: 每天细心的把它装在私家星巴客保温杯里。

sentences.english: The doctor felt the pulse carefully.
After careful screening we finally have selected a body of 463 vocabulary items showing parallels between Chinese and Thai.
sentences.chinese: 经过细心筛选，我们收录了463个汉泰音义近似词。

sentences.english: The President, an attentive and benevolent man, raised his voice.
sentences.chinese: 庭长是个细心周到的人，他大声发言了。

sentences.english: I took a meticulous count, and five eggs were still gestating.
sentences.chinese: 我细心一数，有五颗蛋尚未孵出来呢。

sentences.english: She makes careful choices when buying shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她买鞋子时作细心的挑选。

sentences.english: That nurse is famous for her kindness and carefulness .
sentences.chinese: 那个护士由于她的热心和细心而闻名。

definition: conscientious/earnest/serious/to take seriously/to take to heart
to put one's heart (and soul) into sth/with great care
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
carefully/meticulously/to set one's heart on sth
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to be careful/to pay attention to
